description.@en: You have adopted the thaumaturgic arts, learning to Magickally manipulate metals to bend, shape and twist to your very desire.

effect.@en: You can now attempt to learn Magicks from the Arcana of Transmutation. In addition, you automatically learn one Petty and one Lesser Magick spell from the Arcana of Transmutation. You cannot cast Lesser Magick from the Arcana of Transmutation until you have two Skill Ranks in Incantation. You can continue to learn Generalist Magick. Finally, you may only ever use Arcana of Transmutation and cannot adopt any other Profession that gives different Arcana types.
